title: Is iPhone 12 Series going to launch in November 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: Not confirmed yet but according to some rumours apple is going to unveil it's iphone 12 series on 12th or 13th of October 2020 and some are stating that it is going to be launch in November now. But take it with a pinch of salt as nothing is confirmed yet and these are just rumours but october launch rumours are much more stronger than the rumours which states that iphone 12 series is going to launch in November. Thank you.
There is no official statement released by apple that they are going to release apple 12 series in November so we need wait more .
